plugin.name: LotJUFG
plugin.author: @Johnson
plugin.purpose: Small Script to display UFG Time

muclient.triggers: <trigger name="UFGShow" script="showUFGTime" match="^\(OOC\) (?P.*) can not be captured. Next window in (?P.*)\:(?P.*)\:(?P.*)\:(?P.*)$" enabled="y" regexp="y" group="LotJUFG" sequence="100" />
